newsitem.title: BULGARIA: REPO TURNOVER FALLS ON BULGARIA BOURSE.
newsitem.headline: REPO TURNOVER FALLS ON BULGARIA BOURSE.

text.p: Only one repo deal in treasury paper worth of 1.225 million levs was struck on the Sofia Stock Exchange (SSE), down from Tuesday's turnover of 1.329 million levs, brokers said.
The paper yields 1.90 percent until repurchase.
No corporate stocks traded on the SSE for a thirteenth day in a row and the RABSI (Reuter All Bulgaria Stock Index) was unchanged from Tuesday's 41.31 points.
The other local bourse, the Bulgarian Stock Exchange (BSE) has been in a summer recess since August 5 and will resume trading on September 2. -- Sofia Newsroom, (++359-2) 981 8569
